results.name: Array read by antidiagonals: Consecutive finite permutations of positive integers in reverse colexicographic order.
comment: Row n is the n-th finite permutation of {1,2,3,4,...}.
link: Tilman Piesk, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..7259

example: The first 24 permutations of positive integers in rev colex order:
